Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: అழுக்காறு எனஒரு பாவி திருச்செற்றுத்தீயுழி உய்த்து விடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Envy will destroy (a man's) wealth (in his world) and drive him into the pit of fire (in the world to come).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: Envy ('అழுக்காறு') is personified as a singular, powerful, and malevolent sinner or demon ('ஒரு பாவி').
Layered_Composition.Midground: This demon of Envy is shown performing two destructive acts upon a person. First, it attacks and destroys all the person's worldly wealth and prosperity ('திருச் செற்று'), turning their riches to dust.
Layered_Composition.Background: Second, having destroyed their happiness in this world, the demon is shown grabbing the person's soul and forcefully casting it down into a terrible, fiery hell or a world of suffering ('தீயுழி உய்த்து விடும்'), ensuring their ruin in the next life as well.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The personification of Envy as a singular, demonic force that actively destroys a person's wealth in this life and then condemns them to a fiery hell in the next.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: Envy as a single, powerful demon shows its focused and absolute destructive power. The two-stage destruction—first the wealth, then the soul—is a key narrative element.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The demon of Envy is wreathed in a sickly, green-black, corrupting flame. The destruction of wealth is a shower of sparks and dust. The pit of fire is a terrifying, hellish vortex of red and orange.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dynamic, epic shot that shows the demon of Envy performing its two-stage act of destruction upon its victim.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, with a terrifying and powerful design for the personified Envy.
